sentences.en: But Wale argues there's more to the company's success than that.
sentences.cn: 但是威尔坚持认为让公司成功的因素还有很多.

sentences.en: Mr. Wale gave no indication that GM is already planning an additional factory in China.
sentences.cn: 甘文维并未暗示通用汽车已经筹划在中国再建一家工厂.

sentences.en: The law prohibit the wale of alcohol to minor.
sentences.cn: 法律禁止向未成年人出售酒类.

sentences.cn: 甘文维还说,小城市的汽车需求应能保证部分增长势头.
